page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: 1 PUBLIC TRANSPORT- There are some bus services in our area.Eastern Counties( National Bus Co),Premier Travel, Burtons, Cambus and others.Most buses are single deck one man operated. There are no railway stations or lines.There are several taxi firms,they do a lot of business. 2 PRIVATE TRANSPORT- Most people(or families)own a car.A car is essential if you live in the countryside.Some people ride motor bikes as well. There are 3 main roads in Haverhill which are A143 Bury St Edmunds,A604 Cambridge to Colchester and the B1057 Steeple Bumpstead there are a lot of other roads but they are not used as much. Quite a few people use pedal cycles. 3 COMMERCIAL TRANSPORT- All goods in our area are delivered by vans or lorries.
